Package jsx.ui

Contains general classes for representing user interfaces.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Box<T extends Widget> A base class for box widgets.
Component Defines components wrapping HTML or XML elements.
Container A base class for container widgets.
Container.Layout A base class that constructs default layout managers.
Control A base class for control widgets.
ProgressBar A base class for progress widgets.
Toggle A base class for toggle widgets.
Tree A base class for tree widgets.
Viewport Defines the view port of the current HTML document.
Widget A base class for graphical widgets.
Widget.Event<T> An abstract base class for high level events to be fired from widgets.
 

Package jsx.ui Description

Contains general classes for representing user interfaces.
